sentences.en: An aftershock jolted me awake with the thud of collapsing buildings.
sentences.cn: 我在一阵余震的晃动下醒来,周围响起建筑物坍塌的声音.

sentences.en: From below, and out of sight, came a heavy thud.
sentences.cn: 从下面, 视野之外的地方, 传来了沉重的砰然落地声.

sentences.en: He fell on the floor with a thud.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声跌倒在地板上.

sentences.en: He put it on the table with a thud.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声把它墩在桌子上.

sentences.en: Her heart gave a great thud against her chest.
sentences.cn: 她的心在胸膛里猛烈地跳动了一下.

sentences.en: His head hit the floor with a dull thud.
sentences.cn: 他的头砰的一声撞在了地板上。

sentences.en: His head hit the floor with a sickening thud .
sentences.cn: 他的头撞在地上，发出一声让人心惊的闷响。

sentences.en: I heard the regular thud thud thud of running shoes behind me.
sentences.cn: 我听到身后跑鞋有节奏地噔噔噔地响着。

sentences.en: My heart had started to thud, and my mouth was dry.
sentences.cn: 我的心开始咚咚跳，嘴里发干。

sentences.en: school-leavers have now come back down to earth with a thud.
sentences.cn: 辍学者们现在才突然从幻想中清醒过来。

sentences.en: She ran up the stairs, her bare feet thudding on the wood.
sentences.cn: 她跑上楼梯，光脚在木头上发出噔噔的声音。

sentences.en: She tripped and fell with a sickening thud.
sentences.cn: 她绊了一下，重重地摔倒在地。

sentences.en: The book hit the floor with a thud.
sentences.cn: 这书砰的一声落在地板上.

sentences.en: The bundle fell with a thud.
The coffin closed with a dull thud.
sentences.cn: 棺材合上时发出一声闷响。

sentences.en: The encyclopedia fell to the floor with a thud.
sentences.cn: 那本百科全书砰的一声掉到地上.

sentences.en: The tree fell to the ground with a thud.
Then he heard a piercing scream echoing down the deep well, ending in a dull, dead thud.
sentences.cn: 接着他听见深井里回响起一声刺耳的尖叫，然后是砰的一声闷响，再之后就什么也听不见了。

phrases.tran_cn: 猛然清醒，突然回到现实中

trans.tran_en: the low sound made by a heavy object hitting something else
If something thuds somewhere, it makes a dull sound, usually when it falls onto or hits something else
